name: coupler-io-data-analyst
description: Connect data from hundreds of data sources and apps to analyze it with Claude.
long_description:
Key features

- Access data via natural language: Analyze data without SQL or coding skills. Connect to hundreds of data flows and dashboards, and get answers just by asking like you'd ask your colleague.

- Always stay up to date: Coupler.io keeps your data fresh based on the schedule you create, so Claude delivers on-demand reports and insights whenever you need them.

- Blend data across sources: Combine data from multiple sources and interact with it directly in your AI chat.

- Analyze big data with AI: Coupler.io MCP enables Claude to handle large datasets without limits, so you get complete insights without context window restrictions.

- Turn your data into dialogue: analyze, explore, and automate insights directly in Claude.

tools.name: get-data
tools.description: Get data from a Coupler.io data flow run.

tools.name: get-schema
tools.description: Get data table schema from a Coupler.io data flow.

tools.name: get-dataflow
tools.description: Get a Coupler.io data flow by ID.
